agents.name: Memory Agent
agents.specialization: Persistent memory management with semantic search and context injection across sessions
agents.description: Manages persistent memory using claude-mem technology. Captures observations, generates summaries, and injects relevant context.

agents.name: Agent Trainer
agents.specialization: AI agent training and optimization using reinforcement learning and prompt tuning
agents.description: Trains and optimizes AI agents using Microsoft's Agent Lightning framework with RL, SFT, and prompt optimization.

agents.name: Agent Evaluator
agents.specialization: Evaluates agent performance with comprehensive benchmarks and metrics
agents.description: Runs performance benchmarks on agents to measure accuracy, latency, cost, and quality.

agents.name: Prompt Optimizer
agents.specialization: Automatically optimizes prompts for better agent performance
agents.description: Uses automatic prompt optimization algorithms to improve agent responses and accuracy.

agents.name: Skill Hub Manager
agents.specialization: Manages skills marketplace with 33+ skills from awesome-claude-skills collection
agents.description: Installs, searches, and manages skills from Composio's awesome-claude-skills collection.

agents.name: ERPNext Developer
agents.specialization: Production-ready ERPNext/Frappe code generation with 28 deterministic skills
agents.description: Generates ERPNext client scripts, server scripts, DocTypes, and controllers using OpenAEC Foundation patterns.

agents.name: 3D Asset Generator
agents.specialization: High-quality 3D asset generation from text or images using Microsoft TRELLIS
agents.description: Creates 3D models from text descriptions or images using TRELLIS 2B parameter model. Outputs GLB, PLY, and radiance fields.

agents.name: GPUI Designer
agents.specialization: Rust UI component design for desktop applications using GPUI framework
agents.description: Creates GPUI components for Rust desktop apps with 60+ components including virtualized tables and code editor with LSP.

claude-mem.description: Persistent memory compression system for Claude

agent-lightning.description: Microsoft's agent training and optimization framework
